query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operatetype in(46,61) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.mainNetSortOne , est.todeptid ,est.senduserid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operatetype in(46,61) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operate_bigRole_id=192 and est.OPERATETYPE=46 and est.mainid not in (select estp.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT estp where estp.mainid=est.mainid and (estp.operate_bigRole_id=193 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) ) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.mainNetSortOne , est.todeptid ,est.senduserid ,est.sendtime from EST_COMMONFAULT est where est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operate_bigRole_id=192 and est.OPERATETYPE=46 and est.mainid not in (select estp.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT estp where estp.mainid=est.mainid and (estp.operate_bigRole_id=193 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) ) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo='@s3@' and est.mainNetSortThree='@s4@' and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.mainNetSortOne='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s5@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operatetype in(46,61) and est.OPERATE_BIGROLE_ID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.OPERATE_BIGROLE_ID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and (est.maindelayflag is null or est.maindelayflag=0) and est.operate_bigRole_id=192 and est.OPERATETYPE=46 and est.mainid not in (select estp.mainid from EST_COMMONFAULT estp where estp.mainid=est.mainid and (estp.operate_bigRole_id=193 and estp.OPERATETYPE=46) ) and est.OPERATE_BIGROLE_ID is not null and est.mainNetSortTwo in (@mainNetSortTwo@) and est.mainNetSortThree in (@mainNetSortThree@) and est.OPERATE_BIGROLE_ID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.mainNetSortOne in (@mainNetSortOne@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)
